name: Solitaire Collection-Card Game
description:
"Aged Solitaire Collection, includes Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider Solitaire, FreeCell Solitaire, Pyramid Solitiare, is a brand new collection of various solitaire card games.
Our Solitaire Collection will bring fun and challenge to all card lovers with simple rules and various gameplay. It would be the best casual games for brain exercise.
If you like playing classic crad games, please do not miss this solitaire collection!

Feature:

+The best of Solitaire games(includes Classic Solitaire, Spider, Freecell and Pyramid)
+ Multiple language options
+ Daily challenges of different difficulty
+ Freely switch between portrait screen and landscape screen
+ Choose left-handed or right-handed mode
+ Various backgrounds and cards with different facial styles.
+ Click & Drag function, when you click on a card, it can automatically move to the correct position
+ HINT can guide the next move
+ Automatically save unfinished games
+ Unlimited undo
+ If you win the game, you can get corresponding points and experience points.

Games：

- Classic Solitaire( Klondike or Patience)
Try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode from Ace to King.
Get a higher score with less time and fewer steps.

- Spider Solitaire
Play with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits.
Use the fewest steps to collect the cards on the table.
Try to challenge yourself by playing two suits or four suits.

- Freecell Solitaire
The most strategic of all Solitaire card games.
Use the empty column to move all the cards of the same suit to the base in the order of A to K.
The secret of winning is the extra four cells!

- Pyremid Solitaire
Remove the two cards with a total of 13 from the board.
Eliminate the card at the top of the pyramid and win!

Enjoy the most popular solitaire games in one single app?
Train your brain as well as kill time ?
If you've played solitaire(Klondike or Patience), Pyramid, FreeCell, Spider, or other card games, you are going to love this solitaire collection on the mobility devices.
Download for free now and start playing!"
